blocks.label: Title
blocks.text: What‚Äôs Your Emotional Intelligence Superpower?

blocks.label: Description
blocks.text:
You‚Äôve got the spark ‚ÄîEmotional Intelligence is how you ignite it.

This quiz shows which EI strength leads your way, and how to unlock the rest.

Ready to meet the version of you that leads with clarity and connects with purpose?

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: When faced with a tense situation, what‚Äôs your first reaction?

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: D. Think about how to bring everyone back together.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: C. Look for the lesson or silver lining.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: B. Take a moment to notice how it affects me.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: A. Tune into how others are feeling.

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: Someone you care about is upset ‚Äîwhat do you do?

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: D. Find ways to motivate or cheer them up.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: C. Reassure them that things will improve.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: B. Reflect on your own reactions and avoid adding tension.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: A. Listen and feel what they feel.

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: You‚Äôre under pressure. How do you handle it?

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: D. Rally your circle for support and progress.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: C. Keep a positive mindset and keep moving.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: B. Get clear about your own emotional triggers.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: A. Stay calm for others‚Äô sake.

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: In a group project, what role do you naturally fall into?

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: D. The one who unites the vision and people.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: C. The one who keeps morale high.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: B. The one who reflects on how things are flowing.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: A. The one who keeps harmony.

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: You‚Äôve made a mistake ‚Äî what‚Äôs your approach?

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: D. Reframe it as part of the bigger mission.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: C. Laugh, learn, and get better.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: B. Own up and learn about yourself through it.

blocks.label: Answer
blocks.text: A. Acknowledge how others may feel about it.

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: Your inner voice sounds like‚Ä¶

blocks.label: Answer A
blocks.text: A. ‚ÄúHow are they feeling?‚Äù

blocks.label: Answer B
blocks.text: B. ‚ÄúWhy did this affect me this way?‚Äù

blocks.label: Answer C
blocks.text: C. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs okay, everything‚Äôs a lesson.‚Äù

blocks.label: Answer D
blocks.text: D. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve got this ‚Äî keep going!‚Äù

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: When you get feedback, you...

blocks.label: Answer A
blocks.text: A. Sense the emotions behind the words.

blocks.label: Answer B
blocks.text: B. Examine your internal response first.

blocks.label: Answer C
blocks.text: C. Take it in stride and use it as fuel.

blocks.label: Answer D
blocks.text: D. See it as guidance for the team or future path.

blocks.label: Question
blocks.text: Your friends would describe you as...

blocks.label: Answer A
blocks.text: A. Deeply compassionate.

blocks.label: Answer B
blocks.text: B. Mindful and grounded.

blocks.label: Answer C
blocks.text: C. Uplifting and positive.

blocks.label: Answer D
blocks.text: D. Inspiring and unifying.

blocks.label: Description
blocks.text:
Well done ‚Äîyou didn‚Äôt just take a quiz... you took a moment to understand you.

What you've just done shows courage, curiosity, and a deeper kind of intelligence that most overlook.

üîé Press the button below and step into the mirror ‚Äîwhere you‚Äôll meet the version of you that‚Äôs been waiting to be seen.

blocks.label: Title
blocks.text: üíé Result A: The Grounded Heart

blocks.label: Description
blocks.text:
You‚Äôre the anchor in the room ‚Äîcalm, empathetic, and quietly powerful.

People turn to you when things get messy because your energy says, ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve got this.‚Äù You don‚Äôt just feel ‚Äîyou understand.

üåü Superpower: Emotional stability that calms storms.
üí° Growth Edge: Speak your truth ‚Äîyour voice carries more weight than you think.
üß† Next Level: Lead with presence and boundaries ‚Äîpeace is your power.

blocks.label: Title
blocks.text: üî• Result B: The Expressive Flame

blocks.label: Description
blocks.text:
You‚Äôre emotionally alive, intuitive, and unapologetically expressive.

You speak from the heart and connect through honesty ‚Äîmaking the invisible visible. Your emotions aren‚Äôt noise ‚Äîthey‚Äôre your radar.

üåü Superpower: Authentic connection through raw truth.
üí° Growth Edge: Pause before reacting ‚Äîyour depth deserves direction.
üß† Next Level: Channel your fire into people and projects that ignite you ‚Äîyou‚Äôre not here to tone it down.

blocks.label: Title
blocks.text: üß† Result C: The Thoughtful Observer

blocks.label: Description
blocks.text:
You‚Äôve got range ‚Äîa thinker with heart and eyes on everything.

You feel deeply, but wisely. You don‚Äôt react ‚Äîyou observe, then move with meaning. It‚Äôs not cold ‚Äîit‚Äôs calculated empathy, and it runs deep.

üåü Superpower: Pattern recognition with emotional insight.
üí° Growth Edge: Let your guard down ‚Äîyour truth doesn‚Äôt need polish to be powerful.
üß† Next Level: Trust grows when you show up in real-time ‚Äîpeople are ready for all of you.

blocks.label: Title
blocks.text: ‚ö° Result D: The Adaptive Mirror

blocks.label: Description
blocks.text:
You read the room like a second language.

You adapt not to please ‚Äîbut because you understand. Your emotional radar makes people feel seen, safe, and understood. That‚Äôs real power.

üåü Superpower: Emotional mirroring that builds instant trust.
üí° Growth Edge: Stay rooted ‚Äîdon‚Äôt dissolve into everyone else‚Äôs energy.
üß† Next Level: Lead from your values, not just vibes ‚Äîthat‚Äôs how influence becomes legacy.

blocks.label: Title
blocks.text: ‚ÄúYou don‚Äôt need permission to rise ‚Äîyou only need awareness of your own power.‚Äù
